title: PubMatic (PUBM) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
snippet: Shares of programmatic advertising platform Pubmatic (NASDAQ: PUBM) fell 20.9% in the afternoon session after its weak third-quarter forecast overshadowed strong second-quarter earnings. The programmatic advertising company reported second-quarter revenue of $71.

title: Why PubMatic Stock Fell 33.7% This Morning
snippet: PubMatic stock fell 33.7%, despite beating second-quarter earnings and revenue expectations. Video-advertising revenue jumped 34%, with connected TV ads growing 50% year over year. The stock fell to an all-time low.

title: PubMatic stock plunges 28% despite strong earnings, hit by DSP partnership concerns
snippet: Shares of PubMatic (NASDAQ:PUBM) dropped 28% in Tuesday's premarket trading, as strong quarterly results were overshadowed by challenges linked to a key demand-side platform (DSP) partner. Management pointed to a major headwind stemming from recent platform changes made by one of its top DSP buyers,

title: PubMatic's (NASDAQ:PUBM) Q2 Sales Top Estimates But Stock Drops 22.7%
snippet: Programmatic advertising platform Pubmatic (NASDAQ: PUBM) reported Q2 CY2025 results topping the market's revenue expectations, with sales up 5.7% year on year to $71.1 million. On the other hand, next quarter's revenue guidance of $63.
